Title: Die Wonderwerker

Plot: Die Wonderwerker tells the story of EugÃ¨ne Marais, a famous Afrikaans writer, poet and researcher. The story focuses on the few months he spends on the Van Rooyen's farm, where he falls in love with the 19-year-old Jane Brayshaw.
